question: What are the bonuses for wearing three pieces and six pieces of the Bear School Gear in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt?
answer: For three pieces, when a Quen shield shatters, there is a chance a new one will be cast at no Stamina cost. The bonus increases by 5% for each piece of the set. For six pieces, damage dealt by Abilities involving the Quen Sign is increased by 200%.
